channel.title: Joyce Murray
channel.description: Recent news about Joyce Murray, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Dirk and me at a windy gathering on Lawrence McCauley's amazing lawn. The #PEI ppl warm; the mussels yummy! #LPC http://t.co/oI8wU9n1VU

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Concerned about #Syria ...Parliament should be recalled 2 debate situation. Canada must support humanitarian aid, Syrian refugees #cdnpoIi

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Lots still 2 do! "@janephilpott: Thnx ... for a good day. I learned that #LPC women are ready to help build a stronger Canada."

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: MP John McKay, new #Liberal Environmnt Critic 4 five days, ready 2 answer questions at #PEI policy Town Hall #cdnpoli http://t.co/YbqoraAiMO

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Enjoying my role as speaker and panellist on 'Women in Business' at a Town Hall w/ MPs on stage in Charlottetown. http://t.co/IfTFg1YGnr

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: FN Chief: "1 in 5 FN up-river of #FraserRiver's Hell's Gate Canyon starve 2 death in 1914: salmon blocked by blasting-rlated rockslide" 2/2

item.title: Mentioned by Prince George Citizen
item.description:
Liberal MP bullish about PG's economic role
Joyce Murray was in Prince George last week for meetings with her political party's volunteers and to meet with business owners in the area. It was her second trip to Prince George in the past year, a year in which she campaigned her way to second place in ...

item.title: Mentioned by Timmins Press
item.description:
Federal Liberals no friends of small businesses
Recently, The Daily Press published a partisan letter from MP Joyce Murray (Liberal — Vancouver Quadra). The letter made a series of claims with no basis in fact. Worse, it deliberately failed to mention the Liberals' actual record of voting against small ...
